channel.title: GitHub actions/runner-images Announcement
channel.description: GitHub Actions runner images. Contribute to actions/runner-images development by creating an account on GitHub.

item.title: [All OSs] .NET 5.x will be removed from the images on January, 29
The Ubuntu 18.04 Actions runner image will begin deprecation on 2022/08/08 and will be fully unsupported by 2023/04/01
The macOS 10.15 Actions runner image will begin deprecation on 5/31/22 and will be fully unsupported by 12/1/22 for GitHub and ADO
